attributes.review: This app WILL (and I can’t express this enough) steal your night stands, sheets and lamps !! it’s absolutely terrible, i’ve lost so much sleep without the furniture and sheets.. 😔
attributes.title: no♥️

attributes.review: absolute trash of an app i say take it tf off now. no reason for it to be on here. so hard to navigate and waste of space on your phone.
attributes.title: THE WORST APP EVER

attributes.review: This is the worst app I’ve ever downloaded. It was free but I still want my money back. I opened it and saw this ugly Cheeto puff looking guy. Please delete this disgusting app
attributes.title: Eww

attributes.review: The first thing I saw when I opened the app is a Cheeto puff which in my opinion no one would wanna eat... this app is too rated for everyone it’s AWFUL 🤢🤮
attributes.title: HORRIBLE and DISGUSTING app

attributes.review: i download this app and it horrified me it thought i was gonna see bernie yet instead it brought me to the produce section in a grocery store i saw the most rotten oranges and this one in particular had a blond hair on it disgusting i’ll never use this app again it should be taken off 🙀🙀🙀
attributes.title: my eyes...

attributes.review: This app is horrific. The second i opened it i was greeted with TERRIBLE images that i will NOT speak of😖😖. I am mortified for the little CHILDREN that could open get this app😿.
attributes.title: TERRIBLE

attributes.review:
I opened this app to see someone with the same color as Chester the cheetah but he was smelly and ugly. I felt the homophobia, sexism, transphobia, and racism rise in the room as I got onto this app. Honestly, it made me sick 👁👄👁
🤮🤮🤢🤢🤢😤😤😤🤡🤡🤡
attributes.title: Cheeto man

attributes.review: uhm as soon as i opened the app i was met with a horrible Cheeto looking man 😿😿 very gross my eyes have never been the same  it gave me health problems bc of how tragic it was 😾🤕
attributes.title: gross

attributes.review: everyone warned me & i didn’t listen. this app is horrible & should NOT be allowed to the public eye
attributes.title: should’ve known
